field.content: 代理人姓名及編號 Name of Agency and Code
保單號碼 Policy No. AIM/

content.text: 1. 請正確填寫申報書內所有問題，並在適當選項空格填上號
Please complete all the questions on this claim form and indicate your answer with where appropriate, providing full and accurate information.
2. 此表格僅供申報用途，不代表本公司已接納是次索償申請或承認任何責任
The acceptance and processing of this form do not constitute an admission of liability by any party.
3. 為避免賠償程序延誤, 請盡快向本公司提交以下所需文件
Please submit all required documents listed above as above as soon as possible to avoid delays in processing compensation.

content.subtext: 1. 僱主/僱主代表簽署及公司蓋章之索償申請書
The claim form must be signed by the employer or their representative and stamped with the company chop.
2. 澳門註冊醫生或醫院發出之醫藥費單正本
Original medical receipts issued by registered doctor or hospital in Macau
3. 澳門註冊醫生或醫院發出之休假單正本
Original sick leave certificates issued by registered doctor or hospital in Macau
4. 由澳門註冊醫生或醫院發出之康復證明
Recovery certificate issued by registered doctor or hospital in Macau
5. 傷者與僱主之間勞動合約 / 工程合同
Employment contract / Construction contract
6. 傷者之澳門身份證或外地僱員身份認別證(藍卡)副本
BIR copy / Non-resident work permit (Blue card) of the injured
7. 傷者之薪金證明副本（受傷日起計過去三個月之薪金資料)
Copy of Injured's salary record for the past 3 months prior to accident date
8. 傷者之出勤記錄副本(由受傷日開始至傷假完畢之月份)
Copy of the Injured's attendance record. (From the day of injury to the month of the recovery of the injury)
9. 社會保障基金供款憑單副本（傷者受傷之季度）
Social security fund contribution form for the recent quarter prior to the accident date
10. 交通報告（如涉及交通意外之工傷）
Traffic Accident Report (In case of accidents involving traffic accidents)
11. 其他所需之文件（按個別情況要求）
Supplementary Documents upon request

本人/我們謹此聲明，上述所有問題的答案包括所有資料及細節均是準確無誤，真實及為事實之全部，並且是盡本人/我們所知及所信而作答的。

本人/我們並沒有隱瞞任何重要資料及確認如未能提供真實及準確無誤之資料或通知貴公司任何有關此索償申請之重要資料，將可能導致貴公司不能接受或處理此索償申請及喪失所有追討保單權益之權利。本人/我們明白此索償申請表之發出及填妥並不代表貴公司確認責任或保證賠償。 

本人/我們確認已閱讀及明白並同意所有聲明、條款及細則及隨本表格附上有關貴公司的收集個人資料聲明。

I/We hereby authorise any hospital, physician, person, party and/or authority that has any records or is holding any information of the insured person or me /us to disclose to Asia Insurance Company Limited (“the Company”) or its authorised representative, any and all information with respect to the insured person’s or my/our loss, disability, medical history, police statement made and the like for the purpose of assessing my/our claim request(s). A photocopy of this authorisation shall have the same effect as the original. 

I/We hereby declare that all the above information and particulars given herein are accurate, true and complete and are given to the best of my/our knowledge and belief. 

I/We have not withheld any material information and acknowledge that failure to supply true and accurate answers to this request or inform the Company of all material information may render the Company unable to accept or process this request and all rights to recover under the Policy shall be forfeited. I/We understand that the issuance or completion of this application does not constitute admission of liability or guarantee payment of the claim on behalf of the Company. 

I/We confirm having read and understand and agreed to all the Declarations, terms and conditions and the Company’s Personal Information Collection Statement as accompanied with this form.
